description.narrative: The overall objective of the programme is increased realization of civil and social rights in China, which will, in part, be achieved through the three component objectives of the programme; increased access to criminal justice and compliance with fair trial guarantees; enhanced public participation in the area of migrant workers¿ rights and environmental protection; and strengthened human rights education for school children, university students and civil servants. These objectives will be achieved through close cooperation with different Chinese partners, and through the expected outcomes of the programme; reform of the Re-education through Labour system; promotion of fair trial guarantees and judicial independence; strengthened implementation of the revised Criminal Procedure Law; empowerment of internal migrant workers; increased awareness of the need for reform of the Household Registration System; increased exchange between and strengthened capacities of environmental Civil Society Organizations; and strengthened human rights education for school children, university students and civil servants.
